MessageHistory.Text: Greetings. You can now get your supplies delivered directly to your properties. Use the deliveries app on your phone to place an order.
I've received $405 cash from you. Your debt is now paid off.

I need a dead drop:
6x Granddaddy Purple Seed
Got it. I'll let you know when it's ready. Should be about 3 hours
The drop is ready. You can find it outside apartment 2 of the western apartment block
I'm still currently waiting on a payment of <color=#46CB4F>$270</color>. Please deposit it into my stash box when you've got a chance.
You can pay off your debt by placing cash in my stash. It's behind Dan's Hardware.
I've received $270 cash from you. Your debt is now paid off.
Agreed. I'll be next to the mayor's house for the next 6 hours.
Agreed. I'll be in the west construction site for the next 6 hours.
